summary: Added inductive definition of identity sentences to syntax section with base case (atomic identity sentences A equiv B) and Boolean closure (negation, conjunction, disjunction). Removed incorrect definition from Constitutive Consequence section and replaced with cross-reference. Document compiles successfully.

completion_data.completion_summary: Added inductive definition of identity sentences to the Constitutive Foundation syntax section, defining them as the Boolean closure of atomic identity sentences (A equiv B). Updated Constitutive Consequence section to reference the new definition. Document compiles to 46-page PDF.

next_steps: Review PDF output and verify formatting of the new definition in context
